title: Cryptomiles1
author: Cryptomiles1
content: Greetings my good people of 9ja.I just carry this pieces of advise come here to tell our people most especially the newbies and people who carry money put for front say them go quickly make am ones them join here. Yes, na true say here get lots of opportunities wey be say as you come you fit begin collect small small chopings onto say you know wetin you dey do, collecting those small chopings no be to just come here copy any post from other website paste for this forum go make you see those small things but as a redcap chief or titled man you be, carry your skills put for front here like anything you be.. weda content creator o, or designer o, artist o, craftsman like something wey go make you stand here to dey collect small small bar go really better pass than any other illegal activity you wan involve yourself based on say; we 9ja any small thing we dey think how to carry street mata join our body to make the hustle move more faster and quickly.E go vex me say our newbies just come spoil everything for us onto say them dey look for way to grow why because before you go reach 10 you must first start with 1 so no short cut about because even though you still jump reach that levels e get some certain things wey go make you still dey do like newbie wey go even put you for big trouble wey you no fit come out wey go later results of being ban or taking you out from this industry. In essence what i mine trying to say, keep pushing and working always be creatives via your skills of activities or something else that qualifies you to be here bring them up so that you will last here than being kicked out as an ass hole.Advised no be course and i just say make advise people wey dey come because the rate at which we dey get newbie's no be here oo and them need someone to dey always talk to them. With my little experience at least i don spend good 5 years here and July 15th this year fit make me 6 years here, look too well those people wey don reach higher rank dem we first them show here despite say dem open eyes run reach whatever rank them reach today e no matter, wetin mata pass na how you take follow instructions and do your thing well. Wetin i believe say everybody go still reach that rank them want if them get patient.I come in peaceðŸ˜Ž

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: 130 merits in almost 5 years, is this advice necessary? Let what you are posting do the advice. This thread is not necessary. Other people opinions about this may be different.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Well, big man sorry to tell you @Charles-tim, if you must watch very well i never knew my right and left in this forum for about 2 to 3 years if i am not mistaken, I was only focusing on the bounty section thinking that was were life ends. As a matter of fact i never put that much effort on this forum based on my Marine training (basically, Electrical Installation and Maintenance onboard (ETO, Electro Technical Officer) the vessel at ONNE PHC), which took all my time after i noticed nothing were coming out from bounty's as it was at the earliest time of 2018. I think is just last year ending i began to put efforts so don't judge me by merits because many of us as we started has long abandoned this forum for long because there no mentorship and guidance, Bro na all this experience make me come here dey talk oo so no just reason my matta, you self fit put hand increase am for me Â  at least if you show me love e no go pass you big man. One love

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: You aren't far from the truth because at some point I got discouraged looking elsewhere to sustain my family since I don't have that time and patient to seat at place with smartphone or computer. Whereas some may have that passion to be moving around this forum learning new things and exploring the forum even more better than anyone else. Looking from Charles-Tim profile you would know he started just of 2020 which is only 3 years here why because he developed himself reading exploring more things making him to get this point.Let me just support Charles-Tim in saying "let what your posting do the advise". Hehe

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: MainIbem on April 30, 2023, 11:10:50 PMLet me just support Charles-Tim in saying "let what your posting do the advise". HeheThe reason I posted it is because I do not wish other people to start creating advising topics. I did that in the past on the main boards in beginners and help and reputation board. But I was newbie and showing to people that says it is difficult to rank on Bitcointalk, and that only established members are sharing the smerits, that they are sharing the smerits within themselves. I brought such topic up to let them (the upcoming newbies) know that they can do it too.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Omo.. Eh really shock me say both you O.P and MainIbem don dey this forum for more than 5yrs and yet still struggling at "Full & Sr. Member" rank oh. But shah, I go say make una no give up, because in this life no be everybody grace nah dey the same oh, of which eh no mean say we wey don grow better pass una oh, but only just that we were able to grab the opportunity and use it at the right time. Because I fit remember back then when I was still a lower rank member for this forum, and I took out time to study the forum for months, to know the kind of post wey dey get merit and why eh dey get merit, so as to be able to capitalize on creating such kind of content in the future to get merits too, and I swear to you I no go lie, that method actually helped me, simply because I was able to understand what works here and apply it instantly, of which I know say any Newbie reading this post of mine can also do the same, only if you can create out time to study what works on this forum and apply it immediately before it gets saturated, because I bet you, that was the exact strategy "Agbe" and I used which got us this far.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Na true wey you talk big man. Patience dey really important in other to succeed in this forum. Many at times people dey run faster than their shadow and before you know it dem don fall inside fire. Some of the newbies wey identify themselves here no dey de forum again because dem no get de patience to continue dey grow for de forum while some dem don ban them because dem commit one offense or de other, mainly plagiarism. Na to understand de forum, abide by de rules and guidelines, work hard to create a niche for yourself here, if you get skills or service wey you fit render e also make sense.

comments.author: Wolfblood200$
comments.created_time: May 02, 2023, 01:54:31 PMLast edit: May 03, 2023, 03:09:55 PM by Wolfblood200$
comments.body: Thanks you for the advice e no easy to grow meritÂ  but I still dey patience to learn more about this forum and how e dey work.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on April 30, 2023, 10:16:21 PM130 merits in almost 5 years, is this advice necessary? Let what you are posting do the advice. This thread is not necessary. Other people opinions about this may be different.Well, never judge, that you have the ability to climb fast does not mean every one have the same ability, so lets learn to respect and welcome each other regardless of how long one have been on the forum and how many merit he or she have earned, Las Las, it all ends here on the forum, rank on this forum does not depict rank outside the forum, i have lots of personal friends who are currently newbie on this forum, but I respect them so well outside this forum because they are my boss in terms of wealth and affluence..And again, I joined this forum in 2016, posted for a while, then abandoned the forum till 2020 when I came back to find out alot have change, i started all over again like a newbie, and sincerely, I thank God for the level where I am today - so before you judge any user by the amount of merit the user have, or rank, hear or read his or her story first.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on May 02, 2023, 02:46:07 PMWell, never judge, that you have the ability to climb fast does not mean every one have the same ability, so lets learn to respect and welcome each other regardless of how long one have been on the forum and how many merit he or she have earned, Las Las, it all ends here on the forum, rank on this forum does not depict rank outside the forum, i have lots of personal friends who are currently newbie on this forum, but I respect them so well outside this forum because they are my boss in terms of wealth and affluence..Please do not post nonsense if you do not read a thread fully, nobody is comparing anybody.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Thank you for the head up mate I know say we wey be beginners really get along way to go because this industry no pure like then and true true if you no get person wey go guide you up through everything in life dey really dey hard. Even those that are lecturers today also have a mentor even the so called President self get mentors that guides them to rule the nation. So I believe say if you know things wey others knows as then you for go higher as well.But life na jeje nothing to rush in life.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.created_time: May 02, 2023, 05:43:49 PMLast edit: May 02, 2023, 05:55:44 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on May 02, 2023, 02:49:29 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on May 02, 2023, 02:46:07 PMWell, never judge, that you have the ability to climb fast does not mean every one have the same ability, so lets learn to respect and welcome each other regardless of how long one have been on the forum and how many merit he or she have earned, Las Las, it all ends here on the forum, rank on this forum does not depict rank outside the forum, i have lots of personal friends who are currently newbie on this forum, but I respect them so well outside this forum because they are my boss in terms of wealth and affluence..Please do not post nonsense if you do not read a thread fully, nobody is comparing anybody.I will just ignore you, I've got more important things to do with my time than barter words with you - nonsense indeed.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on May 02, 2023, 05:43:49 PMQuote from: Charles-Tim on May 02, 2023, 02:49:29 PM~~~Abeg make una nor forget say una two nah big names when dey represent we naija for this forum Wella, so ee never reach the level when una go Kon dey exchange words... Nah una we look when make us reach where we dey so ooh.@Fivestar4everMVP if you check the thread well you go see say after @Charles-Tim write that comment Op come explain the reason why he nor quick grow for he early days for this forum. @Charles-Tim even merit the post to show say he really read am and wetin he (Op) talk enter.Most times nor be every achievement you suppose dey post about for this forum, sometimes those your achievement thread fit even make some people when nor even send you before for this forum do some digging when go cause you problem, I don see several cases before and one even happen recently.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: sokani on May 02, 2023, 12:48:08 PMNa true wey you talk big man. Patience dey really important in other to succeed in this forum. Many at times people dey run faster than their shadow and before you know it dem don fall inside fire. Some of the newbies wey identify themselves here no dey de forum again because dem no get de patience to continue dey grow for de forum while some dem don ban them because dem commit one offense or de other, mainly plagiarism. Na to understand de forum, abide by de rules and guidelines, work hard to create a niche for yourself here, if you get skills or service wey you fit render e also make sense.E get the talk wey say patience is a virtue. That talk no be lie. Most people no get patience at all them want quick quick result and this kind of things don land Dem for big trouble wey pass their head.Â  As far as this bitcointalk platform dey like this so, na patience person go need to get to grow or rise through ranks. No be one day thing no be even one month thing but na gradual process and steps wey dey involved.Most new bies wey dey come onboard here no dey take their time to read forum policies at all.Â  For instance the mata of plagiarism na one major thing wey Dem no Sabi say this platform dey frown over am but these newbies Dem go just go copy from google come paste here without citing where Dem copy for which is not professional.I want to talk to the newbies them. I know say e no easy but make Dem tryÂ  dey do things right here so that them no go get issues because e no go make sense say person don try work on account for long dey go upÂ  and the next thing person see na say him don begin get issues . E dey pain well well so make them try dey patient dey follow guidelines and dey make sure say Dem dey ask questions for here wey b the local board for us make our high rank members or anybody wey get answers to their questions answer them.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on April 30, 2023, 10:51:25 PMWell, big man sorry to tell you @Charles-tim, if you must watch very well i never knew my right and left in this forum for about 2 to 3 years if i am not mistaken, I was only focusing on the bounty section thinking that was were life ends. As a matter of fact i never put that much effort on this forum based on my Marine training (basically, Electrical Installation and Maintenance onboard (ETO, Electro Technical Officer) the vessel at ONNE PHC), which took all my time after i noticed nothing were coming out from bounty's as it was at the earliest time of 2018. I think is just last year ending i began to put efforts so don't judge me by merits because many of us as we started has long abandoned this forum for long because there no mentorship and guidance, Bro na all this experience make me come here dey talk oo so no just reason my matta, you self fit put hand increase am for me Â  at least if you show me love e no go pass you big man. One loveThis ranking of a thing for this forum na base on your efforts on post quality for the forum. If am to sae, no be only you started on a wrong note of "focusing on bounty section". Many of us started on the same lane as well before we get to this present position wey we d now. Anyway all those things happen to us based on sae we be newbie and we no get any mentor or guidance for the forum. Peso mind then na altcoin bounties na where better dey pass(wey be sae na lie). Peso no d even focus on building em account. Wetin peso know na to make that 10 posts per week that's it, to the end of the bounty campaign. One thing I find out for this forum and I keep telling newbie be sae, you go fit get to any level wey you think or dream of someday. Just be patient. There is no hurry sae you go reach to a particular rank as soso time. Anyway, in case if you d among those wey d think sae them don spend years for the forum and they are still a junior member or member rank, no try feel bad or give up on the forum sae nothing come out for you for the forum. Wetin I go tell you be sae make you try find out where you are getting it wrong. Whether you d among those wey dÂ  focus on altcoin bounties especially without putting much efforts on building their account on making quality post. Whatever the case may be, there is still hope for you to start afresh now to be the best version of yourself for the forum

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on May 02, 2023, 02:49:29 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on May 02, 2023, 02:46:07 PMSnipPlease do not post nonsense if you do not read a thread fully, nobody is comparing anybody.Abeg big man e never reach like that, no too put mouth for every matter we know how far the forum be. At least check most people wey dey post here you go understand the lyrics but I no supposed mention am make external get the point. Based on your level here you supposed freestyle something, I know say every body get their target but make e no be say we we come dey see ourselves as treat or something else.Infact they wey we supposed do self na oda people I dey see those things for their thread/board onto say them wan carry them selves along. Nothing spoil if we carry ourselves along just as igbo people dey talk am "hazuo'gi zuo'onyeâ€™ozo"Meaning say; if them train you, you train another person. Na so we go carry expand full everywhere for here. Na just advise I say make I carry come board for we people but if them no comprehend your post no mean say you go vex. Me just take here as my FB because I no fit go FB again go catch cruise wey I get something wey better pass am.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on May 02, 2023, 09:39:21 PMI think we have polluted this thread already, but let me finally explained how it should be in my opinion.First, I do not know Cryptomiles1 real identity. What should bring respect in this matter like Africa mentality. Even if I know him, I do not see anything wrong to give my opinion for him bringing up an advice topic as I do not see it necessary. Later on my second post, I stated the reason is to just discourage people (especially the newbies) from doing such a thing.Cryptomiles1 posted again, I saw the post to be good and I can give it merit. I was the first person to send the post merit, because he moved from being a bounty hunter, to becoming a better poster as he explained. That is a good encouragement for newbies and shit posters that are bounty hunters. This thread become good for me to follow up until I see what I called nonsense post because it is not inline to our recent discussion and completely off-topic that started to pollute this thread and make our discussion not worthy again.I will encourage people to read thread fully before posting. We should not just because we want to meet out weekly post to just read the first posts and post too. Although, I am not implying that Fivestar4everMVP wants to meet post week count, but he did not read this thread in full but just come in an African mentality conclusion.We should know that this is a froum, not a place of Africa respect, even though we are respecting one another. I do not even know most people real identity.

comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on May 03, 2023, 07:44:13 AMQuote from: Cryptomiles1 on May 02, 2023, 09:39:21 PMI think we have polluted this thread already, but let me finally explained how it should be in my opinion.First, I do not know Cryptomiles1 real identity. That is a good encouragement for newbies and shit posters that are bounty hunters. This thread become good for me to follow up until I see what I called nonsense post because it is not inline to our recent discussion and completely off-topic that started to pollute this thread and make our discussion not worthy again.I will encourage people to read thread fully before posting. We should not just because we want to meet out weekly post to just read the first posts and post too. Although, I am not implying that Fivestar4everMVP wants to meet post week count, but he did not read this thread in full but just come in an African mentality conclusion.We should know that this is a froum, not a place of Africa respect, even though we are respecting one another. I do not even know most people real identity.Na true you talk big man.. I have never sets my eyes on you before or even to seat out with you, I know we are one from same country but doesn't mean we've all seen each others, whatever may be the case from any poster who seems not to comprehend your post that doesn't mean such person should jump into conclusion.How do one starts being a quality poster here.At first, that person or person's should be able to read all text word to words just as I does, I spent sometimes 10 to 15 minutes only reading to make sure I fully comprehend what the op is saying before I post out of contents and since I began that I hardly see's my post being deleted by moderators.So make love leads..Thank you as you clear your heart and at least I know say everything don pure.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on May 03, 2023, 07:44:13 AMQuote from: Cryptomiles1 on May 02, 2023, 09:39:21 PMI will encourage people to read thread fully before posting. We should not just because we want to meet out weekly post to just read the first posts and post too. Although, I am not implying that Fivestar4everMVP wants to meet post week count, but he did not read this thread in full but just come in an African mentality conclusion.I accept not reading the entire thread before commenting, I read the OP, then your comment which is the first, the first impression your comment gave me was the comparison stuff, seeing that you even pointed out to op, that he only earned 130 merit in 5 years, as such, he is not qualified to give such an advice.That is what prompted me to want to quickly respond to you, it didn't cross my mind to want to check if your comment has been addressed by the op in his comment, this is my bad and I am sorry about that it..I won't go into how your reply made me feel, I've already buried the hatchet and I've let by gone be by gone..And for the records, I wasn't posting to meet my weekly quota, If I was..- 1st - I will do it in the gambling board, since I get batter pay for posts there..- 2nd - The week just began, why the hurry to meet a weekly quota when for stake signature ad campaign, it's the first day of a new week?Like I said before, I've buried the hatchet, and I've put this behind, and I apologize for my misconceptions, I don't keep grudges against people, living or dead, I don't intend to start now, not on this forum, I believe we all have our different reasons for being here, I will rather focus on my reason for being here, than start making enemies.

comments.author: Framelover
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on April 30, 2023, 09:50:31 PMGreetings my good people of 9ja.I just carry this pieces of advise come here to tell our people most especially the newbies and people who carry money put for front say them go quickly make am ones them join here. Yes, na true say here get lots of opportunities wey be say as you come you fit begin collect small small chopings onto say you know wetin you dey do, collecting those small chopings no be to just come here copy any post from other website paste for this forum go make you see those small things but as a redcap chief or titled man you be, carry your skills put for front here like anything you be.. weda content creator o, or designer o, artist o, craftsman like something wey go make you stand here to dey collect small small bar go really better pass than any other illegal activity you wan involve yourself based on say; we 9ja any small thing we dey think how to carry street mata join our body to make the hustle move more faster and quickly.E go vex me say our newbies just come spoil everything for us onto say them dey look for way to grow why because before you go reach 10 you must first start with 1 so no short cut about because even though you still jump reach that levels e get some certain things wey go make you still dey do like newbie wey go even put you for big trouble wey you no fit come out wey go later results of being ban or taking you out from this industry. In essence what i mine trying to say, keep pushing and working always be creatives via your skills of activities or something else that qualifies you to be here bring them up so that you will last here than being kicked out as an ass hole.Advised no be course and i just say make advise people wey dey come because the rate at which we dey get newbie's no be here oo and them need someone to dey always talk to them. With my little experience at least i don spend good 5 years here and July 15th this year fit make me 6 years here, look too well those people wey don reach higher rank dem we first them show here despite say dem open eyes run reach whatever rank them reach today e no matter, wetin mata pass na how you take follow instructions and do your thing well. Wetin i believe say everybody go still reach that rank them want if them get patient.I come in peaceðŸ˜ŽThanks for the advice to we new members. It's important to showcase skills rather than copy-pasting content. Success takes time and shortcuts may lead to trouble and ban. Focus on developing skills and be patient for desired rank.
